Recommended:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.3 GHz boost) AMD Ryzen 3 3100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 3.9 GHz boost)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Notes: CPU (Processor) • At least 4 physical cores • Base Clock: ~2.4–3.0 GHz • Boost Clock: ~3.5–4.0 GHz • Intel Examples (modern 4C/8T or stronger): - Intel Core i3-10100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.3 GHz boost) - Intel Core i5-7500 (4C/4T, 3.4 GHz base, up to 3.8 GHz boost) [older, but closer to Deck than i5-6400] • AMD Examples (4C/8T or stronger): - AMD Ryzen 3 3100 (4C/8T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 3.9 GHz boost) - AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (4C/8T, 3.2 GHz base, up to 3.4 GHz boost) [older Zen1, but has 8 threads] GPU (Graphics Card) • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 590 Memory (RAM) • Minimum: 6 GB Storage • 20 GB of available HDD space (SSD strongly recommended)
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 (8C/16T, 2.9 GHz base, up to 4.8 GHz boost) AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8C/16T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.4 GHz boost)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT (6 GB VRAM) or RX Vega 56 (8 GB HBM2)
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: CPU (Processor) • ~8 cores, ~3.4–3.6 GHz base, 4.0+ GHz boost (Comparable to Xbox Series S) • Intel Example: - Intel Core i7-10700 (8C/16T, 2.9 GHz base, up to 4.8 GHz boost) • AMD Example: - AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8C/16T, 3.6 GHz base, up to 4.4 GHz boost) GPU (Graphics Card) • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) • AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT (6 GB VRAM) or RX Vega 56 (8 GB HBM2) Memory (RAM) • Recommended: 16 GB Storage • 20 GB of available HDD space (SSD strongly recommended) Operating System • Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
